lead_paragraph: Lingering uncertainties over the sovereign debt crisis in Europe and the direction of a financial regulation bill in the United States weighed heavily on financial stocks.
snippet: Lingering uncertainties over the sovereign debt crisis in Europe and the direction of a financial regulation bill in the United States weighed heavily on financial stocks.

headline.main: Wall Street Finishes April With a Thud
headline.seo: Wall Street Ends April With a Thud
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Finishes April With a Thud
